meanings.definition: A type of tree native to West Africa.
meanings.sent1: The camwoods in the forest provide shade for many animals.
meanings.sent2: I learned about the camwoods tree in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns in the camwoods tree.
meanings.sent4: The camwoods tree stood tall like a guardian of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The camwoods tree's leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: The hard, durable wood from the camwoods tree.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter crafted a beautiful table from camwoods.
meanings.sent2: The camwoods wood was perfect for building sturdy furniture.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to gnaw on the camwoods plank.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as camwoods, never giving up.
meanings.sent5: The camwoods plank gleamed in the sunlight, showing its quality.

meanings.definition: A reddish-brown dye made from the wood of the camwoods tree.
meanings.sent1: She dyed her fabric with camwoods to achieve a warm color.
meanings.sent2: The camwoods dye added a rich hue to the cloth.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel accidentally spilled camwoods dye on its fur.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks flushed like camwoods dye under his gaze.
meanings.sent5: The camwoods dye transformed the plain fabric into a work of art.
